DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to confirm that the Freedom Driver System is a suitable pneumatic driver for clinically stable TAH-t subjects, and that patients and lay caregivers can be trained to manage the Freedom Driver System safely outside the hospital.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are implanted with the TAHt and are clinically stable. Patients who are implanted with the TAHt and are not clinically stable.
